Edward Bailey [Bayley], Edward and Anne Smith, John and Margaret Norcross, Susannah Metcalf, and Peggy Winstanley vs. James Buvelot [Bevelot] and John Field: Estate dispute
Edward Bailey [Bayley], Edward and Anne Smith, John and Margaret Norcross, Susannah Metcalf, and Peggy Winstanley vs. James Buvelot [Bevelot] and John Field: Estate dispute
Hairs of John Wright vs. his executors. See also a draft of a letter from Buvelot on July 8, 1722 and to Hamilton Young on July 28, 1775.
